details.title: 'Won't let any Indian feel threatened'
details.content: Can feel the josh of the public, your excitement understandable. Our country in safe hands and I won't let any Indian feel threatened, Prime Minister Modi said in Rajasthan.

details.title: PM Modi salutes martyrs
details.content: "My resolve to defend the country, and will not let the nation suffer. I salute the martyrs of Indian soil," the Prime Minister said.

details.title: PM Modi recites BJP anthem
details.content: The PM recited the anthem released by the BJP in 2014, saying that he would "like to repeat what he said earlier. "
The Prime Minister said over 20 lakh soldiers got benefit of One Rank One Pension scheme.

details.title: Public address concludes
details.content: PM Modi concludes his speech in Rajasthan's Churu chanting Bharat Mata ki Jai.

details.title: VIDEO | PM Modi's complete speech in Rajasthan

लाइव : पीएम श्री नरेन्द्र मोदी की चूरू, राजस्थान में विशाल विजय संकल्प सभा। https://t.co/bVHW4xT3hj
